S.FORM: Afghanistan Itini i 33 00 N, 65 00 E, noAsiya ko Afghanistan. Polong no sekalay i 652,230 sq km "saka 41 ko rayray no ngangan. " "O sekalay no sera i, 652,230 sq km, no nanom a sekalay i, 0 sq km " sera Masakilac ko sera o malo kakaomahen a sera 58.10 , Malo no kilakilangan a sera 2.10 , malo no roma to a sera 39.80 . siyoto O Kabul ko Siyoto. katomirengan no kitakit a romi'ad Pihiratengan no kitakit a romi'ad i sakafalo 19 a romi'ad. O Sawara'an no kitakit anini i ci Ashraf Ghani Ahmadzai, patirengan a romi'ad i 2014 a miheca saka 9 folad saka 29 a romi'ad. Pi'arawan to lakaw CIA List of current heads of state and government
